body: Angelo, I was able to run the GH file that you uploaded with the Bremen EPW on my machine at home: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1TG3SDXzUBTQQ1ERYE*VdiyKGtNENclu5BbRlsAtjhQodCwNT6-g*E5R8IDKp5umhkUVzwcW6ovVcdR7MHk6SpgEoyfxeN8E/UWGBremen.JPG) I am going to try uninstalling / reinstalling my UWG to see if something could be messing up in the setup as I know others have had issues as well. -Chris
